telegram_error_too_long: The text is too long. See the full json file below.
telegram_desc_circle: Converts any video into a Telegram circle video (video note).
telegram_tags_circle: vn, circle, video, note, telegram, round, converter, convert
telegram_help_circle: 🔵 Circle Video Command /vn or /circle Converts a regular video into a Telegram circle video (video note). ‚úÖ Features: ‚Ä¢ Accepts any video file or reply to one. ‚Ä¢ Automatically crops and converts to circular format. ‚Ñπ️ Notes: ‚Ä¢ Your video will be formatted to Telegram limits for circles: max 1 min duration, ~10MB size, and 1:1 aspect ratio.
telegram_examples_circle:
‚Ä¢ Reply to a video ‚Üí /vn
‚Ä¢ Send video with caption ‚Üí /circle
telegram_desc_parse: Parses a Telegram message and returns its structure as JSON.
telegram_tags_parse: parse, telegram, json, message, debug, inspect
telegram_help_parse: 🛠️ Parse Command /parse or /inspect Analyzes any Telegram message and returns its full structure in JSON format. ‚úÖ Features: ‚Ä¢ Works for any message type ‚Äî text, media, stickers, polls, etc. ‚Ä¢ Shows all available fields (id, sender, chat, media info...) ‚Ä¢ Useful for debugging and bot development. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Notes: ‚Ä¢ Output is formatted JSON for easy reading.
telegram_desc_voice: Converts any audio/video into a Telegram voice message (OGG/Opus).
telegram_tags_voice: voice, audio, video, mp3, telegram, converter, convert
telegram_help_voice: 🎙 Voice Command /voice This command converts any audio file or MP3 you send into a Telegram voice message. ‚úÖ Features: ‚Ä¢ Accepts any audio file or reply to one. ‚Ä¢ Sends the result directly in chat.
telegram_examples_voice:
‚Ä¢ Reply to a audio ‚Üí /voice
‚Ä¢ Send audio with caption ‚Üí /voice
telegram_desc_id: Shows the Telegram ID and details of a user or chat.
telegram_tags_id: id, user, chat, telegram, info, identifier, uid, contact, lookup
telegram_help_id: üÜî ID Command /id Displays the Telegram ID and other details about a user, chat, or contact. ‚úÖ Features: ‚Ä¢ Works on users, bots, and group chats. ‚Ä¢ If used as a reply ‚Äî shows info about the replied user. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Notes: ‚Ä¢ Works in private, group, and channel chats. ‚Ä¢ The ‚ÄúCopy ID‚Äù button makes copying easier.
telegram_examples_id:
‚Ä¢ /id ‚Äî shows current chat ID.
‚Ä¢ Reply to a user ‚Üí /id ‚Äî shows user info.
‚Ä¢ Reply to a contact ‚Üí /id ‚Äî shows phone, links, and country.
